definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

pinyin: Ma3 qi2 dun4 Gong4 he2 guo2

sentences.english: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.
sentences.chinese: 甚至你們作了馬其頓和亞該亞，所有信主之人的榜樣。

sentences.english: The main ethnic group is Macedonian 64.2%.
The territory of the modern Republic of Macedonia became a part of the Province or Banate of Vardar (Vardarska Banovina 1).
sentences.chinese: 馬其頓共和國的領土變成Vardar省的一部分。

sentences.english: I was born on the village of Vivcani near Ohrid in Yugoslavian Macedonia.
sentences.chinese: 我出生在南斯拉夫的馬其頓的奧赫裏德鄉村。

sentences.english: The national government and parliament are based in Skopje, Macedonia's capital.
sentences.chinese: 斯科普里，馬其頓首都，該國政府和國會都位於此。

sentences.english: Macedon was divided into four Roman client republics.
sentences.chinese: 馬其頓被分成四個羅馬附屬的共和國。

sentences.english: In the distance stands the army of Macedon .
sentences.chinese: 遠處站着的是馬其頓的軍隊。

sentences.english: Skopje, Macedonia: Storks mate at sunset in Petrovec village.
sentences.chinese: 馬其頓斯科普里，在夕陽下交配的鸛。

sentences.english: In the rear of the Greeks proper came the kindred Macedonians and Thracians.
sentences.chinese: 希臘本土背後是同種的馬其頓人和色臘基人。

sentences.english: The Republic was one of the poorer areas of the former Yugoslavia.
sentences.chinese: 馬其頓共和國是前南斯拉夫較貧窮的區域之一。

sentences.english: Oh, he could have stayed home in Macedonia, married, raised a family.
sentences.chinese: 也許他可以呆在馬其頓的家裏和東方家庭結親。

sentences.english: In Macedonia, an egg can mean the difference between life and death.
sentences.chinese: 在馬其頓，雞蛋可能意味着生與死的差別。

sentences.english: The most famous Macedonian was Alexander the Great.
sentences.chinese: 最有名的馬其頓人是亞歷山大大帝。

sentences.english: Between Macedon and thessaly of eastern GREece there stood a high mountain.
sentences.chinese: 在馬其頓和希臘東部的色薩利之間聳立着一座高山。
而一切，將從馬其頓開始。

sentences.english: Opener Macedonia, the Netherlands 2 to 1 away victory away, get good start.
sentences.chinese: 首戰馬其頓，荷蘭客場2比1客場告捷，取得開門紅。

pinyin: Ma3 si1 te4 li3 he4 te4

definition: Vanuatu, country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean
to mess sth up/to screw up
